Before we jump into our help session for everyone to ask questions, Stéphane will be providing an overview on how to **make your code faster and more efficient** using the [**RStudio Profiler: Profvis**](https://profvis.r-lib.org/).


Drop-in, and bring your questions as well as your latest creations and great resources you've discovered!
